type: Purchase/Tender for forklift trucks with elevated seating
short_summary: Rough terrain, all-wheel drive forklift trucks
description: National Defence Headquarters is seeking multiple forklift trucks with all-wheel drive and elevated seating for travel on rough terrain. The purchasing team requests all-forks and different variants of the purchase item.
duration_in_months: The exact duration is not specified
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Notice Reference Number:** cb-7761-87356884

**Amendment Number:** 3

**Publication Date:** 2023-08-03

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-13 14:00:00

**Amendment Date:** 2023-09-13

**Governing Agreements:** CETA, CCFTA, CFTA, CHFTA, CWTA, KPFTA, IKEFTA, WSCI, CSGFP, OKLAIPA

**Description:** The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting bids for the procurement of:

*   One (1) Rough terrain, all-wheel drive and all-wheel steering, diesel engine driven, sit-down rider type forklift truck
*   Option for two (2) additional units with the same specifications

**Description of the Goods or Services:** The DND is seeking the procurement of one (1) Rough terrain, all-wheel drive, and all-wheel steering, diesel engine driven, sit-down rider type forklift truck for delivery to Canadian Forces Base Bagotville, QC. The requested delivery date is 270 days after receipt of order (ARO). An option for two (2) additional units with the same specifications is included for delivery within Canada. The Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN) for this procurement is 3930 (N3930E).

**Notice of Proposed Procurement:** The DND will receive tenders from suppliers for the subject procurement. Interested suppliers can obtain information from the DND Contracting Email at DLP53BidsReceiving@forces.gc.ca.

**Contact Information:**

*   Dong Le, Contact Information: dong.le@forces.gc.ca, (999) 999-9999
*   DLP53BidsReceiving@forces.gc.ca

**Submission Instructions:** Suppliers must submit their bids by email only to DLP53BidsReceiving@forces.gc.ca by the specified closing time of September 13, 2023, at 14:00:00. For details, review the section on electronic submission of bids in the solicitation document.

**Please note that while we have undertaken efforts to present the information in a clear and concise manner, we are not a legal expert and do not take responsibility for any eventual discrepancies between the source text and rewritten entry.**
